document.masterDocTitle: Nomenclature of the Sphyraenidae (Teleostei: Carangaria): A synthesis of fossil- and extant-based classification systems

subSubSection.paragraph:
Content: Fifty-three species;
Sphyraena acutipinnis Day, 1876
,
Sphyraena afra Peters, 1844
,
Sphyraena africana Gilchrist & Thompson, 1909
, †
“ Sphyraena ”
amici Agassiz, 1843
,
Sphyraena arabiansis
Abdussamad et al. , 2015
,
Sphyraena argentea Girard, 1854
,
Sphyraena barracuda ( Edwards, 1771 )
, †
Sphyraena bognorensis Casier, 1966a
, †
Sphyraena bolcensis Agassiz, 1843
,
Sphyraena borealis DeKay, 1842
, †
Sphyraena crassidens de Beaufort, 1926
, †
Sphyraena croatica Gorjanović-Kramberger, 1882a
, †
Sphyraena cunhai da Silva Santos & Travassos, 1960
, †
Sphyraena egleri da Silva Santos & Travassos, 1960
,
Sphyraena ensis
Jordan & Gilbert, 1882
, †
Sphyraena fajumensis ( Dames, 1883 )
,
Sphyraena flavicauda Rüppel, 1838
,
Sphyraena forsteri Cuvier, 1829
,
Sphyraena guachancho Cuvier, 1829
, †
Sphyraena hansfuchsi ( Schubert, 1906 )
,
Sphyraena helleri Jenkins, 1901
,
Sphyraena iburiensis Doiuchi & Nakabo, 2005
,
Sphyraena idiastes Heller & Snodgrass, 1903
, †
Sphyraena intermedia Bassani, 1889
,
Sphyraena jello Cuvier, 1829
, †
Sphyraena kugleri Casier, 1966b
, †
Sphyraena longimana Arambourg, 1966
,
Sphyraena lucasana Gill, 1863
, †
Sphyraena lugardi White, 1926
, †
Sphyraena major Leidy, 1855
, †
Sphyraena malembeensis Dartevelle & Casier, 1943
,
Sphyraena nigripinnis Temminck & Schlegel, 1843
,
Sphyraena novaehollandiae Günther, 1860
,
Sphyraena obtusata Cuvier, 1829
, †
Sphyraena pannonica Weiler, 1938
,
Sphyraena picudilla Poey, 1860
,
Sphyraena pinguis Günther, 1874
,
Sphyraena putnamae
Jordan & Seale, 1905
,
Sphyraena qenie Klunzinger, 1870
, †
Sphyraena senni Casier, 1966b
,
Sphyraena sphyraena ( Linnaeus, 1758 )
, †
Sphyraena sternbergensis Winkler, 1875
, †
Sphyraena striata Casier, 1946
, †
Sphyraena substriata ( Münster, 1846 )
, †
Sphyraena suessi Gorjanović-Kramberger, 1882b
,
Sphyraena tome Fowler, 1903
, †
Sphyraena tyrolensis von Meyer, 1863
, †
Sphyraena viannai Dartevelle & Casier, 1949
, †
“ Sphyraena ”
viennensis Steindachner, 1859
,
Sphyraena viridensis Cuvier, 1829
,
Sphyraena waitii Ogilby, 1908
, †
Sphyraena weberi Leriche, 1954
, and †
Sphyraena winkleri Lawley, 1876
.

Comments: No analyses to date have attempted to include simultaneously both fossil and extant species; however, species represented by well-preserved specimens are promising for such combined analyses (e.g., †
Para- sphyraena
apscheronica Switchenska, 1968
and †
Sphyraena bolcensis Agassiz, 1843
). Contrary to
Santini et al. (2015)
, †
Sphyraena bolcensis Agassiz, 1843
has never been suggested to be a stem sphyraenid, basically because its position among shyraenids has never been assessed.
